name: kr-observable
description: Adds reactivity power for your JavaScript

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && tsc -b ./tsconfig.cjs.json ./tsconfig.esm.json ./tsconfig.types.json && node --import tsx ./scripts/genPackageFiles.ts && npm run gen-size-badge
scripts.test: npm run build && node --test --test-reporter=spec ./test/import*.*js && c8 node --import tsx --test --test-reporter=spec ./test/*.test.* && npm run gen-coverage-badge
scripts.test-ts: c8 node --import tsx --test --experimental-strip-types --test-reporter=spec ./tests/*.test.* && npm run gen-coverage-badge

author: Roman Konstantin
